issues.title: Missing Administrative Regulation for Implementation Procedures
issues.description: While the Board Policy establishes the framework for civil and legal rights protections, there is no corresponding Administrative Regulation to provide implementation procedures for whistleblower complaints, investigation processes, and protection mechanisms. This creates a gap in how these rights are operationalized.

legal_citations.text: Requires districts to establish procedures for handling whistleblower disclosures and complaints of retaliation

issues.required_language: Administrative procedures detailing: complaint filing processes, investigation timelines, interim protections for complainants, documentation requirements, and appeal processes for whistleblower protection cases.

issues.title: Missing Whistleblower Hotline Display Requirement Implementation
issues.description: The policy references the requirement to display whistleblower rights and hotline information but lacks specific procedures for where, how, and when this information must be posted and updated.

legal_citations.text: Requires prominent display in lettering larger than size 14 point type of employees' rights and responsibilities under whistleblower laws, including the telephone number of the whistleblower hotline

issues.required_language: Specific procedures for posting whistleblower information including: designated locations (employee break rooms, administrative offices, etc.), responsibility for maintaining current information, update schedules, and format requirements.

issues.title: Incomplete Reference to Complaint Procedures
issues.description: The policy references "district's complaint procedures" for whistleblower retaliation complaints but does not specify which complaint procedure applies or provide cross-references to the appropriate policy/regulation.

legal_citations.text: Requires establishment of procedures for employees to file complaints regarding retaliation for whistleblower disclosures

issues.required_language: Specific reference to the applicable complaint procedure (e.g., "in accordance with BP/AR 4144 - Complaints" or establishment of specific whistleblower complaint procedures).

issues.title: Missing Timeline Requirements for Complaint Processing
issues.description: Neither the policy nor regulation specify timelines for processing whistleblower complaints or investigations, which could lead to indefinite delays and inadequate protection for complainants.

legal_citations.text: Implies reasonable timeframes for complaint resolution to ensure effective protection against retaliation

issues.required_language: Specific timelines for acknowledging complaints (e.g., within 5 business days), conducting investigations (e.g., within 30 calendar days), and providing written responses to complainants.
